title: Does Rito still do the 1000 wins, play with a Rioter?
body: I just reached 1000 wins and was wondering if the 1000 wins thing is still going on. Also, no idea what board to put this on...

replies.body:
I am free right now to play a game. Add me:

Riot ThEntropist

:D

>

Is there any way to unban a permenant banned account?
Literally not the place to ask.

> [{quoted}](name=Kram531,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=xHEjmIih,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-01-01T05:27:29.944+0000)
>
> Is there any way to unban a permenant banned account?

Well there is one solution. Make a new account

Happy New Year :)

No, there is not. When you are banned for being a jerk to everyone, and ignore the initial warnings, your account is gone. You accepted the agreement that said it belonged to Riot, anyway, and you do not have a legal right to it.

It is gone. Forever.
Wish I had seen this yesterday ;-;

When you about to add the neighbor bc playing with a Riotier sounds fun... then your realized he is Diamond. :''( #Suck@LoLLyfe
I got my 1000 win awhile ago... but didnt know about the Rioters playiung with us thing... can i still apply for one?
I have 1090 norm wins aprox and never got a pat on the head for it. What is this about?
I think its just for ranked wins.
It's normal wins, it's every 1K wins you can play with a Rioter.
